meanings.definition: a band or ribbon worn around the head to hold the hair in place
meanings.sent1: She wore a colorful hairband to keep her hair from falling on her face.
meanings.sent2: The girl used a hairband to keep her long hair neatly tied back.
meanings.sent3: The hairband was so tight that it made her head feel like a wrapped present.
meanings.sent4: Her hairband was like a loyal friend, always keeping her hair in check.
meanings.sent5: The glittery hairband sparkled under the sunlight, adding a touch of magic to her look.

meanings.definition: a band or ribbon worn around the hair to keep it off the face
meanings.sent1: During the dance performance, she wore a hairband to keep her hair away from her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The athlete used a hairband to prevent her hair from obstructing her view.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous breeze kept trying to play with her hairband, but it held on tight.
meanings.sent4: Her hairband acted like a guardian, shielding her face from stray strands of hair.
meanings.sent5: The elastic hairband stretched comfortably around her head, ensuring her hair stayed in place.
